original: @267a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @267a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: tsi ti dzva la laksha na n'a ma /
analyzed: tsi ti dzva la laksha na n'a ma /
translated: Cittajvalalakshana-nama

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: mdze nang kyi mtshan nyid ces bya ba /
analyzed: mdze nang kyi mtshan nyid ces bya ba /
translated: The Characteristics of Leprosy

original: dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to glorious Vajrapani.

original: 'gro rnams rdul dang mun pa snying stobs kyi //
analyzed: 'gro rnams rdul dang mun pa snying stobs kyi //
translated: Beings dwell in the mire of rajas, tamas, and sattva,

original: 'dam la gnas te rkyen gyi ri bos non //
analyzed: 'dam la gnas te rkyen gyi ri bos non //
translated: and are oppressed by the mountain of conditions.

original: de bsal shes phyir rang gi rtogs pas bri //
analyzed: de bsal shes phyir rang gi rtogs pas bri //
translated: In order to dispel that, I write with my own understanding.

original: dam pa'i drin thob mgon la spyi btud bshad //
analyzed: dam pa'i drin thob mgon la spyi btud bshad //
translated: I bow my head to the protector who has received the kindness of the sublime ones and explain.

original: de la 'dir nad kyi mtshan nyid dang / bzlas pa'i mtshan nyid dang / de bzlog pa'i thabs so //
analyzed: de la 'dir nad kyi mtshan nyid dang / bzlas pa'i mtshan nyid dang / de bzlog pa'i thabs so //
translated: Here, there are three topics: the characteristics of the disease, the characteristics of the recitation, and the method of reversing it.

original: de la mtshan nyid la bcu gnyis su shes par bya ste /
analyzed: de la mtshan nyid la bcu gnyis su shes par bya ste /
translated: Among those, the characteristics should be understood as twelve.

original: gal te bcu gnyis kyi sa ma bzlog na de 'phro bcad do //
analyzed: gal te bcu gnyis kyi sa ma bzlog na de 'phro bcad do //
translated: If the twelve are not reversed, it is interrupted.

original: 'bad pa dang bcas pas tshogs bsag go //
analyzed: 'bad pa dang bcas pas tshogs bsag go //
translated: With effort, one should accumulate merit.

original: thabs ni 'dod pa'i lha mnyes pas bzlog pa dang / rten cing 'brel pa'i nus pas bzlog pa'o //
analyzed: thabs ni 'dod pa'i lha mnyes pas bzlog pa dang / rten cing 'brel pa'i nus pas bzlog pa'o //
translated: The method is reversing through pleasing the desired deity and reversing through the power of dependent origination.

original: 'dod pa'i lha mnyes pas bzlog pa ni sgrub thabs las shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i lha mnyes pas bzlog pa ni sgrub thabs las shes par bya'o //
translated: The averting of the grahas by pleasing the desire gods should be known from the sadhanas.

original: rten cing 'brel ba'i nus pas bzlog pa ni bla ma'i man ngag las shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rten cing 'brel ba'i nus pas bzlog pa ni bla ma'i man ngag las shes par bya'o //
translated: The averting by the power of dependent origination should be known from the instructions of the guru.

original: mtshan nyid rnams ni 'di lta ste //
analyzed: mtshan nyid rnams ni 'di lta ste //
translated: The characteristics are as follows:游댷Bones, flesh, skin,游댷veins, blood, internal organs,

original: rus dang sha dang pags pa dang // rtsa dang khrag dang nang grol dang // bcud dang chu ste lus kyi stobs //
analyzed: rus dang sha dang pags pa dang // rtsa dang khrag dang nang grol dang // bcud dang chu ste lus kyi stobs //
translated: nutrients, and water are the body's strengths.

original: lus kyi rtsa dang mdog dang dbyibs //
analyzed: lus kyi rtsa dang mdog dang dbyibs //
translated: The body's veins, color, and shape,游댷touch, channels, lymph,

original: reg pa chu ba chu ser dang // klad pa lha ba lus kun la //
analyzed: reg pa chu ba chu ser dang // klad pa lha ba lus kun la //
translated: brain, and spinal fluid pervade the entire body.

original: zhugs pa rnam pa bco brgyad yin //
analyzed: zhugs pa rnam pa bco brgyad yin //
translated: There are eighteen types.

original: rigs kyis @267b ma yin gcig cig min //
analyzed: rigs kyis @267b ma yin gcig cig min //
translated: Not by type, not by one,游댷but rather by one and so on, examine in sequence.

original: 'on kyang gcig sogs rim gyis brtag / rus pa la zhugs pa ni bzhi ste /
analyzed: 'on kyang gcig sogs rim gyis brtag / rus pa la zhugs pa ni bzhi ste /
translated: The bone-invaders are four:

original: lus skem pa dang / gzer che ba dang / na thang de ba dang / thig ler na'o //
analyzed: lus skem pa dang / gzer che ba dang / na thang de ba dang / thig ler na'o //
translated: emaciation of the body, great pain, chronic illness, and pain in the bindus.

original: sha la zhugs pa ni lnga ste /
analyzed: sha la zhugs pa ni lnga ste /
translated: The flesh-invaders are five:

original: lus bem me 'dug pa dang / lus lci ba dang / mdog gnag pa dang ; drings pa snar 'ong pa dang / sha ro 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: lus bem me 'dug pa dang / lus lci ba dang / mdog gnag pa dang ; drings pa snar 'ong pa dang / sha ro 'byung ba'o //
translated: The body is heavy, the complexion is dark, the breath smells bad, and the body emits a bad odor.

original: pags pa la zhugs pa ni gnyis te /
analyzed: pags pa la zhugs pa ni gnyis te /
translated: When it enters the skin, there are two symptoms:

original: sha 'phrig pa dang / mdog skya ba'o //
analyzed: sha 'phrig pa dang / mdog skya ba'o //
translated: the skin itches and the complexion becomes pale.

original: rtsa la zhugs pa ni bcu ste /
analyzed: rtsa la zhugs pa ni bcu ste /
translated: When it enters the channels, there are ten symptoms:

original: lus sbrid ber ber ba brtag pa ni bzlog par dka'o //游댷sgyid lug pa dang / sgyid lcig lcig pa dang / tsha ba 'dzag pa snyam pa dang / tsha rab rab ba dang / tsha ker ker ba dang / tsha breng breng ba dang / lus la sogs pa tsha thang deb dang / tsha bir bir ba dang /游댷yan lag phra ba'o //游댷khrag la zhugs pa ni bzhi ste /
analyzed: lus sbrid ber ber ba brtag pa ni bzlog par dka'o // sgyid lug pa dang / sgyid lcig lcig pa dang / tsha ba 'dzag pa snyam pa dang / tsha rab rab ba dang / tsha ker ker ba dang / tsha breng breng ba dang / lus la sogs pa tsha thang deb dang / tsha bir bir ba dang / yan lag phra ba'o // khrag la zhugs pa ni bzhi ste /
translated: the body stretches and contracts, and it is difficult to reverse this.

original: sna nas skabs skabs su yang yang 'dzag pa dang / tsha ber ber ba dang ; lus lci yor yor ba dang / gdong dmar ba la stag pa'i lo ma'i bris ma ltar 'od ngo //
analyzed: sna nas skabs skabs su yang yang 'dzag pa dang / tsha ber ber ba dang ; lus lci yor yor ba dang / gdong dmar ba la stag pa'i lo ma'i bris ma ltar 'od ngo //

original: nang grol la zhugs pa ni bzhi ste /
analyzed: nang grol la zhugs pa ni bzhi ste /
translated: The four that enter the internal organs are:

original: glo snying mi bde ba dang / skyur thib thib pa dang / snying 'dar phril phril dang / snying mi dga' ba ste bzlog dka'o //
analyzed: glo snying mi bde ba dang / skyur thib thib pa dang / snying 'dar phril phril dang / snying mi dga' ba ste bzlog dka'o //
translated: unhappiness of the lungs and heart, nausea, trembling of the heart, and mental unhappiness. These are difficult to reverse.

original: bcud la zhugs pa ni bzhi ste //
analyzed: bcud la zhugs pa ni bzhi ste //
translated: The four that enter the vital essence are:

original: khu ba mi 'byung ba dang / dbang po ldang mi nus pa dang / khu ba skyo ma'i mdog tu 'ong ba dang / khu ba dangs snyigs bye nas 'ong ba'o //
analyzed: khu ba mi 'byung ba dang / dbang po ldang mi nus pa dang / khu ba skyo ma'i mdog tu 'ong ba dang / khu ba dangs snyigs bye nas 'ong ba'o //
translated: the absence of semen, the inability to arouse the faculties, semen that comes out the color of sour gruel, and semen that comes out with a mixture of pure and impure parts.

original: chu la zhugs pa ni gsum ste /
analyzed: chu la zhugs pa ni gsum ste /
translated: The three that enter the water are:

original: sbubs kyi chu rgya skye gas kyi khu ba ltar 'ong ba dang / sna'i chu rtag tu skyo mar 'dzag pa dang / mig chu rtag par 'dzag pa ste /
analyzed: sbubs kyi chu rgya skye gas kyi khu ba ltar 'ong ba dang / sna'i chu rtag tu skyo mar 'dzag pa dang / mig chu rtag par 'dzag pa ste /
translated: the water in the womb that comes out like the sap of a broken lotus root, the constant dripping of nasal mucus, and the constant dripping of eye mucus.

original: du ba dang ser bu byung ba tsam gyis myur bar 'dzag pa'o //
analyzed: du ba dang ser bu byung ba tsam gyis myur bar 'dzag pa'o //
translated: These are like smoke and mist that quickly disappear.

original: lus kyi stobs la zhugs pa ni gsum ste /
analyzed: lus kyi stobs la zhugs pa ni gsum ste /
translated: The three that enter the body's strength are:

original: lus sgyid lug pa dang / lus myal myal ba yin no //
analyzed: lus sgyid lug pa dang / lus myal myal ba yin no //
translated: the body's lassitude and trembling.

original: lus kyi rtsa la zhugs pa ni gnyis te /
analyzed: lus kyi rtsa la zhugs pa ni gnyis te /
translated: The two that enter the body's channels are:

original: sva rtsi la sogs pa lus kyi dri ma bya'i pags pa bzhin sangs kyis 'gro'o //
analyzed: sva rtsi la sogs pa lus kyi dri ma bya'i pags pa bzhin sangs kyis 'gro'o //
translated: The body's impurities such as sweat are cleansed like the feathers of a bird.

original: mdog la zhugs pa ni gcig ste /
analyzed: mdog la zhugs pa ni gcig ste /
translated: The one that enters the color is as follows:

original: lce bcod kyi mdog bzhin du song ba'o //
analyzed: lce bcod kyi mdog bzhin du song ba'o //
translated: The body becomes the color of a cut tongue.

original: dbyibs la zhugs pa ni gnyis te /
analyzed: dbyibs la zhugs pa ni gnyis te /
translated: The two that enter the shape are as follows:

original: lus gnyer chung gis khebs pa dang / yan lag gi sor mo rnams byi ba'i mjug ma ltar @268a * //
analyzed: lus gnyer chung gis khebs pa dang / yan lag gi sor mo rnams byi ba'i mjug ma ltar @268a * //
translated: The body is covered with many wrinkles, and the fingers and toes become like a rat's tail.

original: song ba'o // reg pa la zhugs pa ni bzhi ste /
analyzed: song ba'o // reg pa la zhugs pa ni bzhi ste /
translated: The four that enter the touch are as follows:

original: sna rtse la sogs par tsha yam yam 'ong ba dang / tsha ber ber 'ong ba dang / lus brtse ba dang / g-ya' ber 'od ba bzhin no //
analyzed: sna rtse la sogs par tsha yam yam 'ong ba dang / tsha ber ber 'ong ba dang / lus brtse ba dang / g-ya' ber 'od ba bzhin no //
translated: The body is touched by a hot, burning sensation, a cold, burning sensation, a feeling of love, and a feeling of irritation.

original: chu ba la zhugs pa ni bzhi ste /
analyzed: chu ba la zhugs pa ni bzhi ste /
translated: The four that enter the bones are as follows:

original: yan lag rengs shing na ba dang / 'bur ba dang / grang sing sing ba dang / tshigs rnams 'khor ba bzhin no //
analyzed: yan lag rengs shing na ba dang / 'bur ba dang / grang sing sing ba dang / tshigs rnams 'khor ba bzhin no //
translated: The limbs become stiff and painful, protrude, feel cold and numb, and the joints become twisted.

original: chu ser la zhugs pa ni lnga ste /
analyzed: chu ser la zhugs pa ni lnga ste /
translated: The five that enter the lymph are as follows:

original: lus za gol gol ba dang / lus za tsag tsag pa dang / lus za lcib lcib pa dang / lus la chu rgang 'ong ba dang / chu rgang byung na yun ring por mi thogs bar 'ong ngo //
analyzed: lus za gol gol ba dang / lus za tsag tsag pa dang / lus za lcib lcib pa dang / lus la chu rgang 'ong ba dang / chu rgang byung na yun ring por mi thogs bar 'ong ngo //
translated: The body is eaten erratically, the body is eaten with a snap, the body is eaten with a crunch, water comes out of the body, and if water comes out, it will come out for a long time without delay.

original: lus la 'brum pa'i rjes sran chung lta bu byung na bzlog par yang sla'o //
analyzed: lus la 'brum pa'i rjes sran chung lta bu byung na bzlog par yang sla'o //
translated: If the body has the appearance of lentil-sized boils, it is easy to reverse.

original: klad pa la zhugs pa ni bzhi ste /
analyzed: klad pa la zhugs pa ni bzhi ste /
translated: There are four that enter the head:

original: mgo phyid phyid skrad ba dang / 'thom pa dang / bem me ba dang / skra nul nul 'byi ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: mgo phyid phyid skrad ba dang / 'thom pa dang / bem me ba dang / skra nul nul 'byi ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: the head shakes, trembles, is heavy, and the hair is slimy, like a mouse, and so on.

original: lha ba la zhugs pa la ni gsum ste /
analyzed: lha ba la zhugs pa la ni gsum ste /
translated: There are three that enter the brain:

original: gdong pa la sogs pa tsha lam lam 'ong ba dang / gdong pa la sogs pa grang seng seng 'ong ba dang / de bzlog par sla'o //
analyzed: gdong pa la sogs pa tsha lam lam 'ong ba dang / gdong pa la sogs pa grang seng seng 'ong ba dang / de bzlog par sla'o //
translated: the face and so on become hot, the face and so on become cold, and it is easy to reverse.

original: lus rid cing gdong thal skya'i mdog tu song ba ni bzlog par dka'o //
analyzed: lus rid cing gdong thal skya'i mdog tu song ba ni bzlog par dka'o //
translated: A thin body and a sallow face are difficult to reverse.

original: lus kun la zhugs pa ni gsum ste /
analyzed: lus kun la zhugs pa ni gsum ste /
translated: There are three that enter the whole body:

original: tshor ba med par gdong pa la sogs pa'i sha 'gyur yin no //
analyzed: tshor ba med par gdong pa la sogs pa'i sha 'gyur yin no //
translated: the flesh of the face and so on becomes numb without sensation.

original: shin tu yang bzlog par dka'o //
analyzed: shin tu yang bzlog par dka'o //
translated: It is very difficult to reverse.

original: klu shin tu yang khro bo dag gis kyang rtags dang mi ldan par thugs kyis kyang 'gro'o //
analyzed: klu shin tu yang khro bo dag gis kyang rtags dang mi ldan par thugs kyis kyang 'gro'o //
translated: Even very wrathful n캐gas will go without signs.

original: bzlog par dka'o //
analyzed: bzlog par dka'o //
translated: It is difficult to reverse.

original: rmal sogs pa 'tshor mi 'dod pa'i rtags dang mi ldan pa ni bzlog par sla'o //
analyzed: rmal sogs pa 'tshor mi 'dod pa'i rtags dang mi ldan pa ni bzlog par sla'o //
translated: Those who do not wish to be cured, such as lepers, are easy to reverse.

original: gzhan yang yan lag phra ba dang / sbom pa dang / thung ba dang / 'khums pa dang / rengs pa la sogs pa la klu'i mtshan nyid du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang yan lag phra ba dang / sbom pa dang / thung ba dang / 'khums pa dang / rengs pa la sogs pa la klu'i mtshan nyid du shes par bya'o //
translated: Moreover, one should know the characteristics of n캐gas from their thin, thick, short, bent, stiff limbs, and so on.

original: rtags de rnams las 'ga' 'ga' ni nad kyi gzhi las kyang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rtags de rnams las 'ga' 'ga' ni nad kyi gzhi las kyang shes par bya'o //
translated: Some of these signs should be known from the basis of the illness.

original: 'ga' la ni klu'i gdon ma yin pa las kyang 'byung bas mtshan nyid so sor shes par bya ste /
analyzed: 'ga' la ni klu'i gdon ma yin pa las kyang 'byung bas mtshan nyid so sor shes par bya ste /
translated: Some occur even without the n캐ga spirit, so one should know the individual characteristics.

original: nad gzhi las byung ba'i sman la sogs pa dang / 'phrod pa'i zas kyis phan pa'o //
analyzed: nad gzhi las byung ba'i sman la sogs pa dang / 'phrod pa'i zas kyis phan pa'o //
translated: Those arising from the basis of illness are helped by medicine and so on, and by suitable food.

original: gzhan gyi ni yun mi rtag pa 'phro 'chad do //
analyzed: gzhan gyi ni yun mi rtag pa 'phro 'chad do //
translated: The others do not last long and are interrupted.

original: 'di 'dra'i mtshan nyid mngon du shes //
analyzed: 'di 'dra'i mtshan nyid mngon du shes //
translated: One should know the characteristics of such.

original: shes nas myur ba'i brtson 'grus kyi //
analyzed: shes nas myur ba'i brtson 'grus kyi //
translated: Having understood, with quick diligence,

original: sna tshogs @268b thabs la ma rmongs pas //
analyzed: sna tshogs @268b thabs la ma rmongs pas //
translated: The various methods, not confused,

original: bzlog pa'i thabs la 'bad par bya //
analyzed: bzlog pa'i thabs la 'bad par bya //
translated: Strive in the methods of reversal.

original: chu rgyun yun rings 'bab pas ni //
analyzed: chu rgyun yun rings 'bab pas ni //
translated: By the long flowing of the water

original: rdo bdag kyang dus su 'bigs //
analyzed: rdo bdag kyang dus su 'bigs //
translated: Even the rock is pierced in time.

original: gdug pa'i dbang byas zhe rings yang //
analyzed: gdug pa'i dbang byas zhe rings yang //
translated: Even the hateful, under the power of hatred,

original: le lo dang bral rtse gcig sems //
analyzed: le lo dang bral rtse gcig sems //
translated: With a mind free from laziness, one-pointed,

original: rgyun du bsgoms na bzlog sems kyis //
analyzed: rgyun du bsgoms na bzlog sems kyis //
translated: If one meditates continuously with a mind of reversal,

original: gdug pa'i nad las thar bar nges //
analyzed: gdug pa'i nad las thar bar nges //
translated: One will certainly be freed from the illness of hatred.

original: rtsol ba can gyi som nyi bral //
analyzed: rtsol ba can gyi som nyi bral //
translated: The diligent one is free from doubt,

original: gang bsam de la mi 'grub med //
analyzed: gang bsam de la mi 'grub med //
translated: Whatever is thought, there is nothing that is not accomplished.

original: des na 'khor ba gces pa ni //
analyzed: des na 'khor ba gces pa ni //
translated: Therefore, cherishing samsara,

original: phung bo srog ni dang ba la //
analyzed: phung bo srog ni dang ba la //
translated: The life of the aggregates is clear,

original: mngon sum nyid du mthong 'gyur gyis //
analyzed: mngon sum nyid du mthong 'gyur gyis //
translated: It will be seen directly,

original: rtsol ba dor bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: rtsol ba dor bar mi bya'o //
translated: So do not give up effort.

original: 'gro ba snying rje rang gis rtogs dang bka' drin gyis //
analyzed: 'gro ba snying rje rang gis rtogs dang bka' drin gyis //
translated: Through compassion for beings, realizing it oneself and through kindness,

original: bdag gis nad kyi mtshan nyid 'di sbyar yon tan gyis //
analyzed: bdag gis nad kyi mtshan nyid 'di sbyar yon tan gyis //
translated: I have applied this characteristic of illness. By the qualities

original: 'gro bas mngon du de rtogs brtson pas de bzlog bya //
analyzed: 'gro bas mngon du de rtogs brtson pas de bzlog bya //
translated: Beings will realize it directly. With effort, it should be reversed.

original: ci yod dge bas 'gro ba 'tsho dka'i nad las grol bar shog / mdze nad kyi mtshan nyid ces bya ba /
analyzed: ci yod dge bas 'gro ba 'tsho dka'i nad las grol bar shog / mdze nad kyi mtshan nyid ces bya ba /
translated: The Characteristics of Leprosy

original: nam gru'i rigs las byung ba /
analyzed: nam gru'i rigs las byung ba /
translated: by J캐bir游댷The Accomplishment of the Great Medicine游댷The Characteristics of Leprosy游댷by J캐bir游댷The Accomplishment of the Great Medicine

original: dngos grub brnyes ba dz'a ba ri bas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: dngos grub brnyes ba dz'a ba ri bas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: by J캐bir

original: // / bal po'i pa tida ta p'u rne dang / bod kyi lo ts'a ba chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur zhing gtan la phab pa'o//
analyzed: // / bal po'i pa tida ta p'u rne dang / bod kyi lo ts'a ba chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur zhing gtan la phab pa'o//
translated: Translated and finalized by the Nepalese pa攷拷껼t T캶k攷攷ㅡs콞ri and the translator-monk Gya Ts칬ndr칲 Seng칠.
